snippet: A 31-year-old woman was fatally shot outside a Brooklyn hospital on Tuesday after briefly leaving the bedside of her sick daughter, the police said.
abstract: Shalema Gaskin is fatally shot outside Brookdale Hospital in Brooklyn after briefly leaving the bedside of her sick daughter; police have not identified a suspect and have no indication of motive.
lead_paragraph: A 31-year-old woman was fatally shot outside a Brooklyn hospital on Tuesday after briefly leaving the bedside of her sick daughter, the police said.

headline.seo: Brooklyn Woman Fatally Shot Outside Brookdale Hospital
headline.main: Woman Is Killed Outside a Hospital
headline.print_headline: Woman Is Killed Outside a Hospital
